comment.body: I think ZeroNet wins out all the DAT/Beaker stuff at the moment due to the nice ZeroNet APIs. It's easy to build dynamic websites in ZeroNet. ZeroNet also has features for pseudo-anonymous identities and the ability to block/mute content you don't like. I think it'll be a while before DAT, IPFS, etc have these. Unfortunately ZN doesn't get the attention that the other networks do - maybe more usage will fix that over time.
